++ Quaal

Quaal Human (F) is an underground mage who sells in [Luthadel], crafting various feather tokens.
Willing to cut deals for customer's looking to meddle with [Venril Sathir]'s plans

Feather Tokens (pg 188 DM)
    -Anchor (50g) (2) 
    -Fan (40g) (3) (-2 days of travel at sea for slow ships, -1 days of travel for fast ships)
    -Swan Boat (100g) (1) 
    -Tree (10)
